==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|お|えん|yomi=ko}}

===Etymology===
/owen/ > /oen/. Literally "great monkey", a comparison of menstruation to the red buttocks of monkeys.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[oeɴ]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おえん|hhira=おゑん}}

# the shedding of the uterine lining in females; [[menstruation]], [[period]]
